name: Mini Mister Mittens
description:
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 of this mini with a Pile of Crystalline Dust, an Obsidian Shard, and an Azure Denaturizing Agent (dropped by creatures in scale 21â€“50 fractals) in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Baron von Scrufflebutt.
